snippet.title: Starbound 1.0 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Starbound hits 1.0 with the addition of a fully-featured campaign and a slew of other features. With the sheer amount of stuff to do, there's never been a better time to jump in and play!

AVAILABLE NOW:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/211820/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/starbound
Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/starbound

Website: http://playstarbound.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/starboundgame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playstarboundgame/
